case.state: Pro Hero Uravity here! What seems to be the trouble?
I'm going to get you back for last time, Himeko!
You're going down, Himeko! Everyone! She's a wanted criminal! And she's impersonated me! And-- and she has a crush on Deku-kun!
Pinky!? O-oh. N-not Mina. Wait a second! She said she'd be here! She tricked me!
A princess like Rinkah! I can see why I was assigned this mission! It's a bodyguard-type event, right? Not that she seems to need it!
Wait a second-- Is there really an emergency here?
Oh, damn it, hold on, don't deal-- Shoot. Ugh, I'll follow the rules, but I swear Mina's pranks go too far sometimes.
Well... I guess I could end up protecting some people... from embarrassment, at least... okay! Plus Ultra! Let's do this!
Hmmmm. Okay, ~cards~!
~cards~ cards should work...
Okay, dealer, I'd like to swap ~cards~.
I'll take ~cards~.
I'll take five, wait... No, wait, ~cards~!
Hmmmm. I think ~cards~?
Ack, ~cards~!
Oh no, ~cards~ cards, please!
I can do this if I get... ~cards~?
Cards...? I mean, I'll have ~cards~!
I could really use ~cards~ about now.
Dealer, can you give me ~cards~ cards, and make them good ones?
I'm over the Moon for these cards! Um. Not you, Ms. Alola.
What’s a Quirk? Oh, don’t be silly. Everyone knows Quirks are the various special powers people have. Not everyone has a Quirk, but everyone knows about them. Right?
You probably know this already, but my Quirk is Zero Gravity! I can nullify the acceleration in an object and cause it to float. Then I can release it by putting my fingertips together.
Hmm… So what Quirks do people here have?
Not that I’d ever endorse cheating, but I think an X-ray or emotive Quirk would be useful here…
Quirks can be kind of a nuisance sometimes. I like to wear gloves when I sleep so I don’t accidentally cause my bedsheets to float. Or the frame…
I know it’s not super pertinent, but I wanted to say there’s lots of cool outfits here tonight, are they tailored to your quirks?
I know it’s not super pertinent, but I wanted to say the fashion and technology industries cater to people based on what abilities they’re born with and that’s great!
I'm over the moon for these cards!
This hand's really strong!
Well, I may have lost my helmet, but I'm playing well now!
Uravity always lands with a bounce! And these cards are definitely helping me take advantage of the situation.
Yes! This is great!
Phew! I was worried I'd have to take off more stabilizing gear. The adjustment period is definitely not the most fun part of my costume.
Great!
Ah! Hold on! I just got so excited over how good my hand is!
Oh, thank goodness! It's never too late to keep trying!
Phew. Looks like I'm safe this round.
This place doesn’t serve food, does it? Just… Liquor. I find being… Er… Drunk… Tends to do weird things with Zero Gravity.
I-I’ve seen tons of different body types just because of how varied Quirks can be, but call me a bit old-fashioned, but I just find the human form incredibly embarrassing.
These cards seem really well-used… You’d think the Inventory would have someone with a Fabrication Quirk on hand to fix them up… Anyone with a Trace Quirk could probably use these to count cards…
Phew! I-I mean, I'm very composed! Ha-ha!
I could've used these cards last round, but at least I'm not naked!
Thank goodness.
Oh now that everyone can see my chest, I get good cards.
At least I don't have to do that in front of everyone.
I really, really hope I don't accidentally zero gravity something or I'll be showing... all of me.
I really do want to be confident, but there’s just something about major nudity that makes me all awkward…
I’m actually really brave when it comes to most stuff. But I-I’m not super comfortable with this.
My heart’s still pounding from the last play… I’ll just… Float here a bit.
Using my Quirk like this isn’t the easiest, but it requires just enough concentration to not fixate on that last round…
My heart’s beating really fast… Without my regulating gear, I’m kind of worried I’ll do something dumb with my Quirk. S-so, how about we stop?
Urrgh. I’m feeling kind of nauseous. Could we call it quits here…? No… Ugh… Okayyy… Okay.
Mmf! Hmm! Yep! Doing great! Yep!
I-I'm not going to throw up due to nerves. That'd just be my Quirk.
Hmmf! Nnmf! I’m fine! You’re fine! W-we’re all fine!
Yep! I'm fine. Absolutely.
I’m glad I got all that embarrassment out of my system… Mostly.
Well, here we go. Time to get serious.
Hmm. I think this hand's a little quirky. I just have to figure out how to use it...
Two cards with the same number are pretty okay, right?
This hand is okay... but it's good enough not to worry!
Don't worry, everyone! The situation and my hand are under control!
Hmm. So, this might be a little late but it doesn't seem like there's really an emergency here... it's too late to deal me out though, huh?
If I knew I was going to be playing a game like this, I'd probably have asked Momo for help. She knows how to adapt to situations really easily. Like, this hand.
Hm. I think this'll be fine.
A hero normally doesn't cheat, but she also doesn't get lied to about the type of game she'll be playing... at least I got a pair.
Oh! I had these cards earlier! They were... Okay, I think.
So... Just curious, what does everyone else have?
Hm...
I can win with these! I know it!
Hmm. This is okay, I guess...
Uh oh, wait a second, I can't see what I ended up with! I think it was an okay hand though!
Ehhh... this is okay, right...?
It's not all any different from my training gear... You don't have to stare so much!
I can do this!
This'll be okay!
This hand's so... neutral. O-oh, no, I mean, it's really good! Definitely take risks if you're not going to lose the game or get really exposed or...
This could go either way... I'd rather keep my panties on, thank you very much.
Um. I know being a hero involves risk, but this isn't dangerous as much as it is shameful...
Hm. I think I should be okay...?
One of you has a Quirk that'll explain why I went through all this, right? Um. For my dignity's sake? I hope?
I hope that in some strange way, this meant someone else got to be safe even though I'm really exposed now.
If this means protecting someone else from losing, then I'll go ahead and lose.
I’m still trying to avoid looking at… Oh no! I should’ve been looking at my cards!
Gosh. Give me bad guys all day over naked people. Uh, though not naked bad guys.
A-ah! I lost a grip on my cards, stop, wait, don’t-- W-wait, this wasn’t my hand!
Sometimes I use my Quirk when I’m nervous. It’s… a bit awkward. Oh, crap this hand! I-I-I was so distracted!
HAHA THIS HAND IS AMAZING! IT SURE IS GREAT! WE ARE HAVING A GREAT TIME GETTING NAKED!
THIS HAND’S GREAT. YEP, SURE IS. I’M EXTREMELY COMFORTABLE AND CONFIDENT RIGHT NOW!
C-crap. Shoot. Dang it. Fudge. W-w-why do I get so flustered by a little bit of skin!
I'm going to... t-that's... n-n-not so... modest.
I’m going to take a deep breath and just… let things go.
H-huh. Would you look at that. This hand is garbage.
NOOOOOO! I just got myself under control!!!
I'm fine. I'm fine. I'm confident and in control of my quirk. Yes. That is me. Uravity. Confident, cool, and cucumber. C-calm as a cucumber.
If I just keep my head, I'll keep my helmet too.
Gah, I think I jumped a little too far in my card request.
Well, at least I can pick something small next...
Urgh. I'm not feeling so good about this...
Um. I know I took off something kind of small last time, would... No, I have to just make do with this hand! It's not over yet!
My boots are honestly getting kind of cramped. They're meant to absorb shock and I'm not really moving much now... N-not that I hope I'll lose!
I'm really running out of equipment, so please let these cards work.
I won't give up, even with cards as bad as these!
I guess Deku-kun would have something to say about working with the hand you're dealt...
Without my stabilizing gear, I'm feeling a bit nauseous.
It's against the rules to Zero Gravity the deck so that nobody can get their cards, right? Just asking. For curiosity.
Hm. W-well, I guess the only way out is through! Time to psyche myself up! Yep!
T-this is worse than that time I had to go to the nurse's office because of that Arousal quirk...
Oh, please, no...
I'm embarrassed just thinking about losing this hand.
E-er, I think my imagination is making the idea of losing way worse than actually losing, b-but I'm probably going to lose with this!
This hand's horrible, which gives me all the more reason to keep up hope!
Is it... weird that I kind of feel like losing?
Um. You can call me Ochako, if you’d like. Maybe if this was a little more personal, it’d be less awkward?
(O-oh gosh. Should I? But she's a girl and I've... she's... really something though... I'll still try to set her up, but... maybe if she wants to do stuff after the game?)
(W-wait a second. I'm into ~player~! That's why I'm trying so hard to set her up! I should just... should I just? This has never happened before!)
(W-wait a second. I'm into ~player~! That's why I'm trying so hard to set her up! I should just... should I just? This has never happened before!)
Okay, I'm going to try and lose this one since someone's definitely in need!
Hey, ~player~, um… I know I’m not into women, but you think some of the girls here are cute, right? (Psst, anyway, I don’t mind being a wingman for you!)

Er… that’s an awfully personal question I do not at all feel compelled to answer… I-I mean, obviously I’d never be interested in that. W-why would I follow advice from Mina to surprise-- Er… nevermind.
Okay, Veran, or whatever your name is, I-I'm not going to let you just break Nayru's clothes, or do lewd things with her, or whatever your designs are!
Shimakaze! もちろん、あなたは日本人です！私はこのようなイースターエッグを加えるのは楽しいと思う。
It's rude to a Quirk to take over someone else, especially in a game like this.
I-it barely covers anything, Shimakaze--! I-I--your--your bra!
You know, I think thongs are fine, but I can't believe you'd just wear one under a dress! What if the wind blew it up?
I'm actually really happy you were wearing some underwear, Mahiru. I-I had reason to believe otherwise!
Speaking of keeping hands warm, I actually have to wear gloves while I sleep... Um. Rinkah, do you have any tips to make sure my... fingertips don't get so sweaty while I wear them?
Er... Sayori, do you have any advice? You're so upbeat about all of this, without being... err... so forward...
See! I knew you making a bet like that was a bad idea! B-but if I win, how about you just put on your clothes...?
You don’t have a father, Meia? That... sounds like you were made out to be a certain way, Meia. That sounds a lot like Quirk Marriages, and that’s a practice that makes me really sad.
Hmn… men who don't give up but are kind and thoughtful are my favorites… Um. To answer Ping--er, Mulan's question.
Um… well, Ping, I mean, Mulan. I like a man who never gives up! But if I liked girls, I think ~player~ would make an excellent bride! And such.
A-anything, D.Va? Are you sure? People are already getting n-naked-- s-s-some more than others! W-what more would you even wager?!
Of course there is, concerned citizen. Why do you ask?
To your question, Elizabeth: absolutely! I'm a hero, and a professional hero at that! I focus mostly on rescue missions, in fact!
Mumbles. Hm? What? I said it, didn't I? Um...
Plus Ultra means a lot of things, Meia! But it means to go beyond your limits, whether that's fear, or exhaustion, or anything! It's really special!
Gosh, Kimberly! You're full of suggestions. I think we're going to get along Plus Ultra!
Hi there, Spider-Woman! I know I'm a bit curvier, but I think it would be cute if we swapped outfits. Maybe for Halloween?
Saki, I may not always be comfortable with this... game... but I'm okay with that, if that makes sense? We all have our strengths and weaknesses.
Meia, it's... you know... a latex a man and a woman wear... so... um. Come doesn't... get inside her...
A Quirk Marriage? Um. Quirk marriages are when people try to mix Quirks deliberately. A very good friend of mine… Well, his father really wanted a child with a combination of certain Quirks…
That song you were humming earlier is really catchy, Sayori!
Mahiru! I better not see that picture anywhere!
O-oh! I. I was expecting something way dirtier. Um… Well, I guess something to do with building things, but I'm very happy with Zero Gravity!
Um. I think condoms are best when you want to. You know.
Um. I think condoms are best for... you know. If you don't want those, you um. Should talk to Mina or Jirou...
Oh! Pit! Oh! I love mochi! Of basically any type.
I don’t really like to drink… but if you’re offering, Sei, could I have one beer? Um. Like a stout. And just one. But a big one! So I can sip it. Yes.
If you're a vegetarian, you might want to avoid those in the future, Twilight.
Magic...? Oh, Quirks aren't magic, but I'm starting to think this whole thing was a prank...
N-nudity feels very personal, Twilight!
Looks like... sorry, I had to stop and think about this. Why do I still get a hand if I'm already naked...? WE HAVE TO WHAT?
I think I’ve heard of Overwatch. You’re the group with the Rewind Quirk, Gorilla Quirk, Deadeye Quirk… Right? Yeah! I was right!
E-er, which one of you has an arousal Quirk? Normally I wouldn't be... enjoying being nude like this in front of you all! Okay, there, I said it!
I-I’m a little scared to see where she’s going with this!
That’s… silly, why would we need to--
Aww, no, it's my Quirk, Velma! Let me explain it...
Well, since D.Va already took off her suit, I feel a little less weird about doing this...
Well, since Gwen already took off her suit, I feel a little less weird about doing this...
Well, since Marinette already took off her suit, I feel a little less weird about doing this...
Well, since Samus already took off her suit, I feel a little less weird about doing this...
Well, since Seven already took off her suit, I feel a little less weird about doing this...
H-hey! It's--it's really comfortable okay! I didn't pick the original design, Jura!
W-what's that supposed to mean, Jura? G-gosh, this stupid strap back here...
I-I’m not awkward about my body!
Not particularly…
U-uhm. You know I’m really so busy and so occupied with work and--
Well… I do like saving people and being the best hero I can. But the money helps make life better for my family too.
That’s a rude thing to call-- did you mean with two c’s?
Well… I do have to work out.
I am really into stargazing lately!
Well, it suspends gravity, briefly. It’s most effective on objects, like clothes, or debris…
W-well, it’s a hero’s job to be there when people are in trouble.
Heh-- I don't think I'd have wanted to go anywhere but UA, but I'm flattered you think so, Chiaki!
Hmm... I guess the tail end of puberty is when talents are at their strongest, Chiaki...
There’s sure a lot of weird Quirks out there. I’m glad you’re his nemesis, Ladybug… and stuff. I’ll try not to um. Bug out about this game.
I sure can! My Quirk is called Zero Gravity! B-but I wouldn't say I'm a superhero. Just a regular one... Your name was Pit, right?
Really, Chiaki? I always thought it was a little less than flattering. It's just so form-fitting!
Wait, AGAIN?
I lost twice in a row? I-I guess I'll just get it together on the next hand.
Even if I lose, I'm glad I have another hero here to back me up!
We're all heroes here, right? So I suppose I can trust you all not to do anything rude...
Well, it'll be just like a trip to the sauna or some mountain hotsprings with other Pro Heroes.
O-okay. Since it's just other heroes and ~player~, who I think's a hero too...
D-do I really have to get naked in front of them?
D-do I really have to get naked in front of them?
N-no, not like this, in front of all these villains!
I don't really think I should be taking off my helmet with a villain right there... Can we make an exception, just this once?
Um. I'm okay following the rules, but I hope ~player~ can support me in case these other three decide that this is a fight.
I don't really think I should be taking off my helmet with a villain right there... Can we make an exception, just this once?
W-wait! I don’t want to-- Mmf!? O-okay, okay, okay. Calm down, Ochako, just take off your helmet…
I can stop once I'm down to my underwear, right?
Phew. Don't worry, Uravity has your back! Though mayyybe this wasn't the right way of going about it.
Hm. If it would make you feel better, I could do a little trick with Zero Gravity, but that's probably a bit too nonchalant.
Aw. This helmet is so iconic though. Oh well, at least I don't need to use my Quirk that much to keep the game interesting. Or maybe I could...
S-sorry everyone, I'm going to just take off something small this round.
I feel kind of bad that the rest of you are, and I'm just going to... well, maybe next round I'll take off a bit more.
Wow, who'd have though UA would prepare us for situations like this one? I'm doing really well! Well, until I lost this hand.
Okay, so, last time was something small... I guess I can take off two pieces like I did the first round...
Well, that's the last of my support items... It feels good to win, but this isn't maybe the best place to gloat.
Woo! Even though I was tricked into coming, I'm still doing pretty well! At least I'm not showing any real skin yet...
Okay. It's just like a locker room, or sparring practice... Except for the rest of you here, in various states of actual undress.
It's just like going to the beach, I suppose. And it is kinda warm in here...
Maybe this'll help everyone else feel comfortable? I guess? Hero regulations are... vague about this kind of... public defense.
U-um. Isn't it a bit lewd to-- W-well, that's not much of a defense considering everyone else is... I'll just get started.
Well, I suppose at this stage in the game it would be... Kind of cowardly to back out...
Um. I kind of realized something. I know this is going to be kind of disappointing, but I didn't exactly prepare for this... Sorry if I'm a little... shaggy.
I really like this helmet!
Well, you all seem really nice. I don't think I'll need my helmet...
I've got pretty good control over my Quirk but sometimes I do get a little excited.
Well, I don't want to take off any of my other essential equipment...
I'll take off my kneepads, I suppose...
I always have to be kind of careful when undressing. My gear tends to float away if I'm not--
So my boots and my wrist-cuffs... That's a mouthful. Why don't we just call them "Uravity Stabilizers!"
You can call these my stabilizers...
I know I didn't exactly take off a lot last time. I'll get more this go... starting with my cuffs. Then I'll get my boots!
W-well, I'm down to my last small piece, which I'm sure somebody is happy about.
I lost again!? Oh no...
Even when it's embarrassing, a hero gives it her all!
M-my full suit?
I guess I should just act like it's a locker room...
What? I have to... show my chest?
(Okay, Ochako, just pretend like it's a hotspring trip with Tsuyu, Mina, Momo, and the others.)
F-for sure? I have to...? Um. O-okay.
Pretend it's art class again, pretend it's art class, pretend it's art class...
I-I'll do it, but it's rude to stare!
Um. Well, I guess Uravity is going to lead the charge!
I don't mind being in the front of you all! Uravity is trained in close quarters combat and is a master of her Quirk!
S-so soon?
H-hold on, let me slow this down just a little bit. A good hero knows when to stall for help, after all!
Huh? Oh no, really? But aren't I already wearing the least out of anyone here? Hnng, okay. I'll take off my wrist gear and boots. If I don't pair them, I get kind of disoriented.
W-well. A hero keeps promises. And I suppose I'm keeping the rest of you from doing anything uncomfortable.
Gulp. At least I had a good run with my hero gear...
I really should turn this game around...
Just saying, if you count my neckbrace and boots as separate items, I've already lost two more pieces... Fine, I'll take my suit off too.
...Okay. I'll just take a deep breath, and then it'll be okay. I'm not going to give up!
This is really not going according to plan. B-but a Pro Hero has to be resourceful!
This is like, a hallucination Quirk, right? Or a bad dream?
Ah-- Um. I'll admit this is a little beyond my comfort zone. But here I go!
Is one of you using a Quirk to make me lose?
H-hold on a second! D-don't!
A picture a-ah, I could nev--er--
A p-picture?! W-wait!!
W-wait! Hold on! No pic--
Um. Once, for a week, we had ah. Art class. Nude modeling. Um. It was... Um.
Hmm... yeah... (Am I getting distracted by ~player~...?)
Oh! Godzillo? He's got such a strong Quirk! It'd be terrible if he attacked... I guess I'd have to stop property damage first...
My kneepads help-- um... I guess with a normal body, you can't really do much heroing if you can't get around... but with a movement Quirk... Um...
Um... our mission handbook tells us to go before major engagements... it usually works...
I thought it was a cool hero name, is all. I didn't put that much thought into it every time I daydreamed at school or something.
Of course I went to school. Quirks are really powerful and need to be trained... And yeah, All Might's pretty amazing...
Deku-kun is really special! And I don't know about that, but I know he developed his Quirk super late...
"Biologically attuned?" Gosh, you're such a quick study, 9S. you and Deku-kun would get along perfectly. Most people have Quirks!
Sei, were you serious when you said you hid aces in your pockets? That's cheating! But um. It wouldn't have really hurt, would it, in terms of not getting naked?
Futaba! I already gave you a lift! What more could you want...?
I’m awkward about bodies in general. W-why can’t people just…
W-wh-what?! Wh-why!? H-How!?
B-blonde? N-no! Never!
It’s so relaxing, but I do like to do some boxing too. Not competitive, just… to let off steam.
It’s… a good way to make a living, but it’s really busy!
Oh! I didn’t even realize Ladybug had an accent! In Japan, people tend to treat you differently if they think you’re from Kansai, so I’m used to hiding mine.
...You aren’t really picking a fight with me, are you? Don’t use your Quirk, you’ll blow this place up!
I don’t use it during… um… intimate times… just once… really…
A-a-and it’s not that uncomfortable. I-I’m proud of my body. J-j-just shy! So I can stick around, just so other people can know they can do it!
...G-gah!
I still take a lot of martial arts classes! I’m pretty good at hand to hand, but I think the kickboxing and stuff helps me stay strong!
Well, I can hold my breath a really long time, but yep! My Quirk is Zero Gravity! I can take away gravitational attraction from an object.
Oh, sorry for not responding sooner, Elizabeth. It's actually supposed to be kind of tight to help with headaches and stuff. I can breathe fine though!
Well, I'm not sure what the "metaverse" is, Futaba. But it sounds cool.
It's definitely a hero costume. You know, like you see on TV?
Ultimate Astronaut... er... n-no, that would probably be Pro Hero Thirteen, Mahiru.
A Miraculous? Is that kinda like a Quirk? I figured you had a Quirk, owing to your costume, but I can’t figure out what it is!
To be honest, I wouldn't mind something a little less form-fitting. I originally wanted something looser, but didn't requisition an outfit in time...
I'm sorry, I can see you have a wing-related Quirk, but I can't quite make the connection between your hero name and your powers, Pit.
Oh, it's actually not glass. It's a really high-tech plastic polymer. Very shock resistant, so even if I hit my face on something, I'm usually fine.
E-er. Well, I can use my Quirk pretty reliably. Is "Blackbox" like Thirteen's Blackhole Quirk? It's kind of a program, but in DNA. Or something?
Er, well, nothing on their own! But they help me not get hurt when I need to jump into stuff, or if I'm using my Quirk!
Well, I do have a signature move I like to call "comet storm," but it's kind of...
Y-yeah! I think it makes sense to be kind of embarrassed about this, Ladybug!
I mean, yeah, Meia, see, watch me spin this kneepad a little bit!
Well, yeah, if you're in space a lot, is it that weird?
Y-you think so, Pit? I can do this with stuff like buildings too!
O-oh, do you mean Todoroki? He's super busy usually, but sure!
H-huh? O-oh. N-n-no, definitely not that! I always go before a mission. That way I don't throw up so much. Um. Not that it happens much.
Huh? Yeah, Futaba, how'd you know I was going to call them stabilizers...?
W-well yeah, but I don't get why I'd need to be too worried about just expressing myself…
W-well, Meia, that's mostly accurate! Everyone at my school has a different Quirk!
Well, mostly! Something like 80% of people on Earth have a Quirk. They can be really strong or weak, but they're all unique!
W-well, it's kind of hard to tell, but I'm actually kinda wobbly like this. But I'm still a lot better at it than when I was a teenager!
Well, everyone's a little different, Rinkah! I think it's great how everyone's trying their best to stand out!
I-is that White Chlorination Syndrome thingy you were talking about responsible for Quirks?
This is always such a pain to get off... and thank you, Daria.
Well, no... I'm just going to take off my belt. It's got storage and stuff...
Let me slip off my belt, Marinette…
I-I'll be okay, Meia, I'm just getting a lot more embarrassed...! I-I don't usually do this kind of thing.
Y-y-you don't need to laugh! This is already really embarrassing!
Well... I do feel bad that... um. You're not getting what you expected...
I sure hope so, this villain of yours has a super scary Quirk!
I-I mean, I really like my Quirk, Meia... my entire costume's built around it, after all!
I'm not really as brave as you, Meia! W-well, not when it comes to this kinda thing.
Oh, well, I'm glad you-- IT'S A QUIRK, NOT A KINK, FUTABA!
I'm-- um, it's a Quirk, not a kink, Futaba!
Um, by chance do you have other bug themed heroes you work with? I know a group of cat-themed heroes…
Sigh Okay, Futaba, if you really want to know, I'll tell you.
Okaygonnatake adeepbreath andtakeoffmy pantiesandignore Marinette--!
E-er. You're right, Pit! I can do this! I just don't want to!
So um. I noticed one of you ladies staring at me and um. While I'm really flattered I don't really swing for the same team. I don't mind you looking though.
Just between us girls, when I really overdo it with my Quirk I get the worst cramps.
I'll take off the neck brace too. It actually gets a little heavy when I'm not using my powers.
Hatsume Mei proposed a few modifications to my helmet, but they're all pretty weird. Who'd want X-Ray vision anyway?
Just let me unhook this here...
Huh? Oh yeah! When I graduated UA, I had a new costume made. The boots and kneepads on this are a lot more flexible!
I know it's small, but I had this modification made special, and I really don't want to lose anymore.
--Oh, sorry! I must look really silly. Let me just release those. It shouldn't happen again!
I find these really comfortable, to be honest. Like a hug for your wrists. And legs.
I've gotten better at it over the years, but my Quirk makes me really nauseous if I'm not careful.
Bye bye, belt.
I've got a few pouches in here, it'd have been pretty funny to have hidden some aces, right? No? Um... okay then.
I actually like that it zips in the back, it's really easy to just float myself up, and... slip out!
